item.title: Products
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Featured products

Behold! A list of selected products just for you! We have created a list of products that can come handy for our customers. For the full list of all products we offer just scroll down. Enjoy! [featured_products per_page="2" columns="2"]

All the products we offer

Surely, you can browser all of our products here. Let's discover the perfect one for you!
item.excerpt:encoded: Welcome to our shop! We provide the best WooCommerce experience optimized for high conversion. This text is your shop page excerpt, ready for some cool, engaging intro message.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: You can use a subtitle also on shop page

item.title: Checkout
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
%wc_title%

You can use page builder also for WooCommerce Cart, Checkout and My Account pages and thus create a more interesting layout.
The login and registration on this demo website is blocked.

[woocommerce_checkout]

Frequently Asked Questions

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

General questions

Where can I get the theme?

You can read more information and download the theme from the marketplace. For other cool WordPress themes please visit www.webmandesign.eu.

Is buying on-line safe?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

Can you ship internationally?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

Orders & Returns questions

Can I cancel or change my order?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

Do I need to register to place an order?

Investor prototype infographic client channels. Graphical user interface pivot long tail first mover advantage series A financing niche market founders holy grail return on investment research & development partner network ecosystem incubator.

How can I return a product?

item.title: My Account
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
%wc_title%

The login and registration on this demo website is blocked.
Scroll down for more information on this page and to preview the shop account page screenshots.

[woocommerce_my_account]

Registeration is not allowed on this website

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Registration form on this page is for preview purposes only, it does not work.
However, we provide preview screenshots of the shop customer account pages.
Click the screenshot links to preview how the "My Account" pages look like.

Screenshots:

  • Dashboard
  • Orders
  • Order detail
  • Downloads
  • Addresses
  • Address editing
  • Account details
  • Checkout: order received
item.excerpt:encoded: The login and registration on this demo website is blocked. Scroll down for more details on this page and preview of shop account pages.

item.title: Default Homepage
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
We're mild and green

Strategy validation investor ecosystem interaction design scrum project business plan hackathon business model canvas niche market business-to-business seed round learning curve:
  1. Buyer series A financing equity.
  2. Partner network buzz crowdsource burn rate.
  3. Research & development gen-z.
  4. Supply chain churn rate beta conversion proof creative.
  5. Rate buyer series A financing equity.
  6. Chain churn rate beta conversion proof creative.

Strategy interaction design focused on project business model niche market.

And squeaky clean

Non-disclosure agreement venture return on investment technology. Learning curve lean startup monetization incubator. Beta crowdsource buyer angel investor twitter ownership leverage rockstar ecosystem agile development crowdfunding marketing startup. Beta angel investor iteration channels metrics hypotheses influencer product management. Supply chain churn rate beta conversion termsheet rockstar ecosystem social proof creative. Zooropa. —
item.excerpt:encoded:
Even a default theme page layout is beautiful enough to be used as your fast loading homepage! No need to use a page builder all the time.
The image background of this intro section changes on each page load.

item.title: Page Template: Blank
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Monument Valley

Accessibility Ready WooCommerce WordPress Theme Masterpiece

This page uses a "Blank" page template from the theme, which is perfect for creating a custom landing pages for service or product you offer.

This is a demo of "No title" page template. Use this page template to remove the page intro title section (when you want to set up your own). For standard pages, the title will be accessibly hidden. On the other hand, if you are using a page builder on the page, please do not forget to set up your custom H1 heading, as it is being completely removed from the page in this case! This page template works best with a page builder.

item.title: Page Template: With sidebar
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Below is just about every HTML element you might want to use in your blog posts. Check the source code to see the many embedded elements within paragraphs.

Heading Two

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, test link adipiscing elit. This is strong. Nullam dignissim convallis est. Quisque aliquam. This is emphasized.

Heading Three

Donec faucibus. Nunc iaculis suscipit dui. 53 = 125. Water is H2O. Nam sit amet sem. Aliquam libero nisi, imperdiet at, tincidunt nec, gravida vehicula, nisl. The New York Times (That’s a citation).

Heading Four

Underline. Maecenas ornare tortor. Donec sed tellus eget sapien fringilla nonummy. Mauris a ante. Suspendisse quam sem, consequat at, commodo vitae, feugiat in, nunc. Morbi imperdiet augue quis tellus.
Heading Five
HTML and CSS are our tools. Mauris a ante. Suspendisse quam sem, consequat at, commodo vitae, feugiat in, nunc. Morbi imperdiet augue quis tellus.
Heading Six
Praesent mattis, massa quis luctus fermentum, turpis mi volutpat justo, eu volutpat enim diam eget metus. To copy a file type COPY filename. Dinner’s at 5:00.Let’s make that 7. This text has been struck.

Quotes

Blockquote

The blockquote is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source. It can be as long or as short as you’d like.
It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it. Oscar Wilde

Pull Quote Styles

To use the pull quote, you simply need to add a class of alignright or alignleft to your content. This can be done in Visual editor with additional style buttons that theme provides. See an example below: 
<blockquote class="alignright">Pull this text right.</blockquote>
This pull quote is just hanging out on the right side of the post. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur.
A pull quote (also known as a lift-out quote) is a quotation or excerpt from an article that is typically placed in a larger or distinctive typeface on the same page, serving to entice readers into an article or to highlight a key topic. The term is principally used in journalism and publishing. Placement of a pull quote on a page may be defined in a publication’s or website’s style guide. Such a typographic device may or may not be aligned with a column on the page. Some designers, for example, choose not to align the quote. In that case, the quotation cuts into two or more columns, as in the example shown.
And this pull quote is pulling text to the left, like a sir. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur.
Pull quotes need not be a verbatim copy of the text being quoted; depending on a publication’s house style pull quotes may be abbreviated for space and/or paraphrased for clarity, with or without indication. There are no hard-and-fast rules for the exact formatting of pull quotes.

List Items

Unordered Lists (Nested)

  • List item one
    • List item one
      • List item one
      • List item two
      • List item three
      • List item four
    • List item two
    • List item three
    • List item four
  • List item two
  • List item three
  • List item four

Ordered List (Nested)

  1. List item one
    1. List item one
      1. List item one
      2. List item two
      3. List item three
      4. List item four
    2. List item two
    3. List item three
    4. List item four
  2. List item two
  3. List item three
  4. List item four

Definition Lists

Definition List Title
Definition list division.
Startup
A startup company or startup is a company or temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.
#dowork
Coined by Rob Dyrdek and his personal body guard Christopher "Big Black" Boykins, "Do Work" works as a self motivator, to motivating your friends.
Do It Live
I'll let Bill O'Reilly will explain this one.

Code Formatting, Tables, Highlighted Text and Address

Preformatted Text and Inline Code

Code can be presented inline, like <?php bloginfo('stylesheet_url'); ?>, or within a <pre> block. 
pre {
	padding: 4%;
	margin-bottom: 1.62em;
	background: #eaecee;
	overflow: auto;
	tab-size: 2;
}

Table Styles

Table Header 1 Table Header 2 Table Header 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3

Highlight Text Style

To use the highlight, you simply need to wrap the text in mark HTML tag. This can be done in the Text editor view. See an example below: 
<mark>This will be highlighted.</mark>

Address Tag

1 Infinite Loop Cupertino, CA 95014 United States

Images and Gallery

Image Alignment

[caption id="" align="aligncenter" width="379"] Captioned image[/caption]

Right Aligned Image

Images may be two-dimensional, such as a photograph, screen display, and as well as a three-dimensional, such as a statue or hologram. They may be captured by optical devices – such as cameras, mirrors, lenses, telescopes, microscopes, etc. and natural objects and phenomena, such as the human eye or water surfaces.

Left Aligned Image

The word image is also used in the broader sense of any two-dimensional figure such as a map, a graph, a pie chart, or an abstract painting. In this wider sense, images can also be rendered manually, such as by drawing, painting, carving, rendered automatically by printing or computer graphics technology, or developed by a combination of methods.

Image Gallery

This is a traditional WordPress thumbnail gallery available in all WordPress sites. To add this gallery, simply click Add Media in your post editor and click Create Gallery. In the Gallery Settings area, choose Thumbnail Grid as the type of gallery. [gallery columns="2" link="file" ids="625,483,350,468"] The awesome mosaic thumbnail gallery is provided by the Jetpack plugin. To add this gallery you will need Jetpack installed. Once installed, simply click Add Media in your post editor and click Create Gallery. In the Gallery Settings area, choose Tiled Mosaic as the type of gallery. [gallery type="rectangular" link="file" ids="625,483,350,468"]

"Formats" Dropdown Button Styles

Dropcap text. Apply this format on the paragraph itself. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat voltu.

Heading style 1

Heading style 3 on paragraph text

Heading style texts can be used to force heading 1-3 display style on a different element, such as paragraph or any of HTML heading tags. Thus allows keeping the semantic markup, but styling it a bit differently.

item.title: Custom CSS Classes
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
How to use?

Apply the custom CSS classes listed below on a page builder element, shortcode or HTML element as you like. If you are using Beaver Builder page builder, you can apply the custom CSS class conveniently using a dropdown selector on "Advanced" tab of your page builder element edit form. With WebMan Amplifier shortcodes you can use a class attribute, just like with HTML code. The list of CSS classes below is organized into groups and each CSS class information is represented as:

Group title:

css-class-name
CSS class description.

List of predefined CSS classes:

Posts list modifiers:

masonry
Applies masonry layout on the list of posts. Use it on page builder elements (or shortcodes) which output list of posts (such as "WM Posts / Custom Posts", "WM Testimonials", "WM Content Module").
simple-layout
Apply on "WM Posts / Custom Posts" page builder element when displaying Posts or Projects only. The posts/projects list will be styled alteratively.
inline
Apply on "WM Content Module" page builder element. Will put the content module icon inline with its title and aligns the text left (or right for RTL websites). (Default contentn module layout is: icon above the module title, text is centered.)
hide-title
Apply on "WM Content Module" page builder element. Hides the content module title (inaccessibly).
item-border
Apply on "WM Content Module" page builder element. Applies border around displayed content module(s).

Page builder column decorations:

box-shadow-#
Apply on Beaver Builder page builder column. Applies drop shadow on columns. Replace # with small, medium or large.

Layout modifiers:

text-center
Apply on any element. Forces text alignment to center.
text-left
Apply on any element. Forces text alignment left.
text-right
Apply on any element. Forces text alignment right.
fullwidth
Best applied on a page builder column, form, image or button element. Makes certain nested elements (such as buttons, images or form fields) full width of the container.
hide-accessibly
Apply on any element. Hides the element accessibly (it will be still available for search engines and assistive technology). If applied on the Beaver Builder page builder element, the element will be visible in editing mode, but hidden otherwise.
split-screen-row
Apply on Beaver Builder page builder row. Will improve the 2-column row style for split screen use (make sure the row is set to full height).

Widgets modifiers:

widget-title-style
Apply on a widget in page builder. Styles the widget title the same way as it is styled in the sidebar and other widget areas.
hide-widget-title-accessibly
Apply on a widget in page builder. Hides widget title accessibly for search engines and assistive technology.
hide-widget-title
Apply on a widget in page builder. Hides widget title inaccessibly.

Typography modifiers:

font-size-#
Apply on any element. Changes the element font size relatively to normal website size (which is m - medium). Replace # with one of these values:
  • xs - Extra small
  • s - Small
  • sm - Smaller
  • l - Large
  • xl - Extra large

Other classes:

form-button-simple
Apply on a form element. Styles the form buttons as simple, outline buttons.
columns-#
Apply on Beaver Builder page builder text element. Divides the text into columns (please note that this might not work in certain browsers that does not support the applied CSS3 styles). Replace # with number of columns from 2 to 5.
item.excerpt:encoded: A list of theme-predefined, helpful custom CSS classes you can use on page builder elements and widgets.

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Testimonials

What customers say about us?

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Obviously locked and loaded digital literacy nor we're ahead of the curve on that one. Core competencies. Streamline low-hanging fruit staff engagement tbrand madness, nor blue money, nor the last person we talked to said this would be ready. Time to open the kimono overcome key issues to meet key milestones, but we need to leverage our synergies, and the last person we talked to said this would be ready bleeding edge.

Clients testimonials:

[wm_posts post_type="wm_projects" columns="3" count="9" order="new" filter="project_tag"][/wm_posts][wm_call_to_action caption="Let's work together!" button_text="Get the theme" button_url="#purchaselink" button_size="l" button_icon="icon-ion-thumbsup"]

Productize horsehead offer, yet we're ahead of the curve on that one streamline staff engagement move the needle. Equity founders success disruptive alpha channels supply chain paradigm shift.

[/wm_call_to_action]
item.excerpt:encoded: We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extendability and easy of use. All of this in a beautifully designed package.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
F. A. Q.

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Here are some common questions about Monument Valley

Privacy

This is an important information about this WordPress theme demo website, please read!

What information do we collect?

Please note that this is just a demo website providing an example of what can be created with Monument Valley WordPress theme.

The website registration is disabled and we do not collect any personal data. If you try to post a comment, please use dummy data, and even then, the comment might get deleted, as the theme provides comments examples.

WooCommerce "My Account" page is not accessible as it requires logging in, and we only provide screenshots of it. Also, please do provide dummy personal information when you try to demo the ordering process. No orders shall be fulfilled.

Shopping

Is buying on-line safe?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Can you ship internationally?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

Orders & Returns

Can I cancel or change my order?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Do I need to register to place an order?

Investor prototype infographic client channels. Graphical user interface pivot long tail first mover advantage series A financing niche market founders holy grail return on investment research & development partner network ecosystem incubator.

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

How can I return a product?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

Others

You can use an accordion for FAQ. However, please note that accordion is not very accessible element and if the page has to be 100% accessible, consider a different design approach.

[wm_accordion mode="toggle"][wm_item title="Can I build this page with a free version of Beaver Builder?" icon="icon-ion-edit"]

Yes, you can! All you can see on this page, and other pages of this Monument Valley WordPress theme demo website, can be build with a free version of Beaver Builder page builder plugin. Actually, we have used a free version of the plugin to build it ;) All the custom theme page builder modules are integrated into the free Beaver Builder too.

[/wm_item][wm_item title="Are accordions and tabs accessible?" icon="icon-ion-ios-body"]

It is not recommended using accordion (and/or tabs) page builder module for information that has to be keyboard accessible. 

Unfortunately, until the accordion gets and accessibility update, it is not controllable using a keyboard only. Please, keep an eye on WebMan Amplifier plugin updates as it will receive more accessibility tweaks soon!

[/wm_item][wm_item title="Is there any other element inaccessible?" icon="icon-ion-ios-body"]

As for the WebMan Amplifier modules (modules under "Theme Modules" category of Beaver Builder page builder), only accordion and tabs are not very accessible currently. However, other modules are perfectly fine.

Please understand that I can't really speak about page builder modules added by 3rd party plugins (including the native advanced Beaver Builder modules). Accessible website (and pages on them) should be designed cautiously.

[/wm_item][wm_item title="So, what should I use instead of accordions and tabs?" icon="icon-ion-android-bulb"]

You can just display the information without them. Maybe separate the information into multiple columns instead. That way the information is immediately accessible for everyone and will provide a higher value to your website visitors.

[/wm_item][wm_item title="Where can I get the theme?" icon="icon-ion-thumbsup"]

You can read more information and download the theme from the marketplace. For other cool WordPress themes please visit www.webmandesign.eu.

[/wm_item][/wm_accordion][wm_call_to_action button_text="Contact us" button_url="#purchaselink" button_color="simple" button_size="l"]

Still need help? Send us a note!

For any other questions, please contact us via a Contact page form or call us directly on +421 900 123 456

[/wm_call_to_action]

:60:"Can I build this page with a free version of Beaver Builder?";s:7:"content";s:459:"

Yes, you can! All you can see on this page, and other pages of this Monument Valley WordPress theme demo website, can be build with a free version of Beaver Builder page builder plugin. Actually, we have used a free version of the plugin to build it ;) All the custom theme page builder modules are integrated into the free Beaver Builder too.

";s:4:"icon";s:13:"icon-ion-edit";s:4:"tags";s:0:"";s:11:"heading_tag";s:0:"";}i:1;O:8:"stdClass":5:{s:5:"title";s:35:"Are accordions and tabs accessible?";s:7:"content";s:362:"

It is not recommended using accordion (and/or tabs) page builder module for information that has to be keyboard accessible. 

Unfortunately, until the accordion gets and accessibility update, it is not controllable using a keyboard only. Please, keep an eye on WebMan Amplifier plugin updates as it will receive more accessibility tweaks soon!

";s:4:"icon";s:17:"icon-ion-ios-body";s:4:"tags";s:0:"";s:11:"heading_tag";s:0:"";}i:2;O:8:"stdClass":5:{s:5:"title";s:40:"Is there any other element inaccessible?";s:7:"content";s:476:"

As for the WebMan Amplifier modules (modules under "Theme Modules" category of Beaver Builder page builder), only accordion and tabs are not very accessible currently. However, other modules are perfectly fine.

Please understand that I can't really speak about page builder modules added by 3rd party plugins (including the native advanced Beaver Builder modules). Accessible website (and pages on them) should be designed cautiously.

";s:4:"icon";s:17:"icon-ion-ios-body";s:4:"tags";s:0:"";s:11:"heading_tag";s:0:"";}i:3;O:8:"stdClass":5:{s:5:"title";s:53:"So, what should I use instead of accordions and tabs?";s:7:"content";s:260:"

You can just display the information without them. Maybe separate the information into multiple columns instead. That way the information is immediately accessible for everyone and will provide a higher value to your website visitors.

";s:4:"icon";s:21:"icon-ion-android-bulb";s:4:"tags";s:0:"";s:11:"heading_tag";s:0:"";}i:4;O:8:"stdClass":5:{s:5:"title";s:26:"Where can I get the theme?";s:7:"content";s:250:"

You can read more information and download the theme from the marketplace. For other cool WordPress themes please visit www.webmandesign.eu.

What information do we collect?

Please note that this is just a demo website providing an example of what can be created with Monument Valley WordPress theme. The website registration is disabled and we do not collect any personal data. If you try to post a comment, please use dummy data, and even then, the comment might get deleted, as the theme provides comments examples. WooCommerce "My Account" page is not accessible as it requires logging in, and we only provide screenshots of it. Also, please do provide dummy personal information when you try to demo the ordering process. No orders shall be fulfilled.";s:10:"margin_top";s:0:"";s:13:"margin_bottom";s:0:"";s:11:"margin_left";s:0:"";s:12:"margin_right";s:0:"";s:18:"responsive_display";s:0:"";s:18:"visibility_display";s:0:"";s:26:"visibility_user_capability";s:0:"";s:9:"animation";s:0:"";s:15:"animation_delay";s:3:"0.0";s:2:"id";s:0:"";s:5:"class";s:0:"";s:4:"type";s:9:"rich-text";}}}

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
We don't sell products.
We deliver happyness.

Story of our shop

The beginning Sleep currency China. Motel globe guide airBnB city trip Asia exchange rate. Nighttrain motel globe chartering foreign Russia wellness Barcelona airmiles recommendations.

Explore city trip boat Amsterdam New York City taxi Berlin booking relaxation Brasil maps Budapest South-America translation. Park stay wellness motel Vienna cabin gateway lonely planet Hong Kong.

What customers say about us

[wm_testimonials columns="3" count="3" order="new" heading_tag="h3"][/wm_testimonials]

item.title: Our Team Creative
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Meet your
superheros

We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extendability and easy of use. In a beautifully designed package.

[wm_divider appearance="whitespace" /]

Peyton Wilkinson

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Social media graphical user interface mass market infographic social proof holy grail research & development gen-z seed round release advisor. Seed round early adopters analytics branding bootstrapping hackathon release non-disclosure agreement. Innovator network effects gamification bootstrapping prototype conversion handshake launch party lean startup facebook.

Flann McGill

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Services we offer

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extendability and easy of use. All in a beautifully designed package.

[wm_button url="#more" color="simple" icon="icon-ion-chevron-down"]More[/wm_button]

We specialize in design, branding and SEO

We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extendability and easy of use. All in a beautifully designed package.

Social media graphical user interface mass market infographic social proof holy grail research & development release advisor. Seed round early adopters analytics branding agreement.

We provide the best services

[wm_divider appearance="line" /][wm_content_module columns="3" count="6" order="new" tag="services" heading_tag="h3"][/wm_content_module][wm_divider appearance="line" /] [wm_call_to_action caption="We'd like to work with you!" button_text="Get the theme" button_url="#purchaselink" button_size="xl"]

Productize horsehead offer, yet we're ahead of the curve on that one streamline staff engagement move the needle. Equity founders success disruptive alpha channels supply chain paradigm shift.

[/wm_call_to_action]

What a customer say?

Praesent sapien massa, convallis a pellentesque nec, egestas non nisi.

[wm_testimonials columns="1" count="1" order="name" category="from-clients"][/wm_testimonials]

No subscriptions

You pay once and it's yours.

GPL licensed

The theme is licensed under GPL.

Updates included

All future theme updates are free.

General questions

Where can I get the theme?

You can read more information and download the theme from the marketplace. For other cool WordPress themes please visit www.webmandesign.eu.

Is buying on-line safe?

Can you ship internationally?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience. Investor prototype infographic client channels.

item.title: Services Fullscreen
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Services we provide

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extendability and easy of use. All in a beautifully designed package.

[wm_button url="#services-1" icon="icon-ion-android-arrow-dropdown-circle"]Have a look[/wm_button][wm_content_module columns="3" count="3" order="new" tag="services-group-1"][/wm_content_module][wm_button url="#services-2" icon="icon-ion-android-arrow-dropdown-circle"]Next[/wm_button][wm_content_module columns="3" count="3" order="new" tag="services-group-2"][/wm_content_module][wm_button url="#services-3" icon="icon-ion-android-arrow-dropdown-circle"]Next[/wm_button]

We'd like to work with you!

Productize horsehead offer, yet we're ahead of the curve on that one streamline staff engagement move the needle. Seed money technology prototype validation gen-z influencer.

[wm_button url="#purchaselink" size="l" icon="icon-ion-checkmark-circled"]Get in touch now![/wm_button]

item.title: Elements
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Page builder elements

This page provides a preview of some custom theme elements you can use within a page builder. You will not find a preview of Custom Module, Posts / Custom Posts and Testimonials elements here as they can be previewed on other pages of this demo website.

Accordions, Toggles and Tabs

Please note that these elements are not very accessible currently.
For more info please see FAQ page.

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Standard tabs:

[wm_tabs layout="top" active="1"][wm_item title="First" icon="icon-ion-android-bar" heading_tag="h3"]

[/wm_item][/wm_tabs]

Messages

[wm_divider appearance="line" /][wm_message title="Default message box"]

Lodge currency last minute Europe hiking. Apartment diary country spa expedia. 

[/wm_message][wm_message title="Icon message box" icon="icon-ion-alert-circled"]

Lodge currency last minute Europe hiking. Apartment diary country spa expedia. 

[/wm_message][wm_message title="Info color message with icon" color="info" icon="icon-ion-information-circled"]

You can choose from additional preset "Success", "Info", "Warning" or "Error" colors for the message box.

[/wm_message]

Buttons

[wm_divider appearance="line" /][wm_button url="#"]Default button[/wm_button][wm_button url="#" size="s"]Small button[/wm_button][wm_button url="#" size="l"]Large button[/wm_button][wm_button url="#" size="xl"]Extra large[/wm_button][wm_button url="#" size="l" icon="icon-ion-android-bicycle"]With icon[/wm_button][wm_button url="#" color="simple" size="l" icon="icon-ion-android-bicycle"]Outlined, fullwidth[/wm_button]

Call to Action

[wm_divider appearance="line" /][wm_call_to_action caption="Call to action caption" heading_tag="h3" button_text="CTA Button Text" button_url="#cta-button-link"]

This is default layout of call to action element. Call to action text here. Lodge currency last minute Europe hiking. Apartment diary country spa expedia.

[/wm_call_to_action][wm_divider appearance="dashed" /][wm_call_to_action heading_tag="h3" button_text="Large + Icon" button_url="#cta-button-link" button_color="simple" button_size="xl" button_icon="icon-ion-android-archive"]

Caption in the CTA text

We set custom caption styling as well as using larger button size, button icon and outlined button style. Call to action text here.

[/wm_call_to_action]
item.excerpt:encoded: Preview of custom page builder elements and shortcodes. Accordions, tabs, message boxes, buttons and call to action.

item.title: Portfolio Home
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Creative Design Studio

We strive to provide the best WordPress experience, delivering the top quality code focused on easy of use.

Professional, Dedicated, Helpful Theme Support

Speed and Search Engine Optimized Code

Accessibility Ready Theme for Every Visitor

Recent client projects

Our Work

Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews.

Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.

[wm_posts post_type="wm_projects" columns="3" count="9" order="new" filter="project_tag" no_margin="1" heading_tag="h3"][/wm_posts]

What customers say about us

[wm_testimonials columns="3" count="3" order="new" heading_tag="h3"][/wm_testimonials]

Within a year
we tripled our customer base!

Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test. Override the digital divide with additional clickthroughs.

Nanotechnology immersion along the information highway will close the loop on focusing solely on the bottom line a new evolved.

Peyton Wilkinson, CEO

[wm_call_to_action caption="We'd like to work with you!" button_text="Get the theme" button_url="#purchaselink" button_color="simple" button_size="xl" button_icon="icon-ion-thumbsup"]

Productize horsehead offer, yet we're ahead of the curve on that one streamline staff engagement move the alpha channels supply chain paradigm shift.

[/wm_call_to_action]
item.excerpt:encoded: Supply chain buyer android rockstar monetization product management success holy grail release incubator.

item.content:encoded:
It's time for Adventure

We strive to provide the best WordPress experience, delivering the top quality code focused on easy of use.

Professional, Dedicated, Helpful Theme Support

Speed and Search Engine Optimized Code

Accessibility Ready Theme for Every Visitor

Product category

Tools »

Product category

Footwear »

Product category

Virtuals »

Featured products

[featured_products per_page="4" columns="4"]

Within a year
we tripled our customer base!

Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test. Override the digital divide.

Nanotechnology immersion along the information highway will close the loop on focusing solely on the bottom line.

Peyton Wilkinson, CEO

We provide the best service

[wm_content_module columns="3" count="3" order="new" tag="features" heading_tag="h4"][/wm_content_module]

Best selling products

[best_selling_products per_page="4" columns="4"]

What our customers say?

[wm_testimonials columns="2" count="2" order="new" heading_tag="h3"][/wm_testimonials][wm_call_to_action caption="Do you like what you see?" button_text="Get the theme" button_url="#purchaselink" button_color="simple" button_size="xl" button_icon="icon-ion-thumbsup"]

Don't hesitate and grab the theme while it's hot! Accessible themes are the future of WordPress and all the web space. Get advantage of using one today!

[/wm_call_to_action]

Most recent news

Subscribe to our news feed to get the most recent updates,
informational tips and tutorials.

[wm_divider appearance="line" /][wm_posts post_type="post" columns="3" count="3" order="new" taxonomy="post_tag:simple-news" heading_tag="h3"][/wm_posts][wm_button url="/monument-valley/blog/" size="l"]Read more »[/wm_button]

item.title: Elegant Home
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Monument Valley
by WebMan Design

We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extensibility and ease of use. In a beautifully designed package.

[wm_button url="#more" icon="icon-ion-android-arrow-dropdown-circle"]Find out more[/wm_button]

WebMan Design is well known among customers for providing quality, timely, helpful, explanatory support with 100% resolutions. Every theme we provide includes a top class, thorough and easy to use documentation.

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Intuitive Design

We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extensibility and ease of use. In a beautifully designed package.

For Accessible Websites

We strive to provide the best WordPress theme experience, delivering the top quality code focused on performance, flexibility, extensibility and ease of use. In a beautifully designed package.

Easy to use,
superfast

WebMan Design is well known among customers for providing quality, timely, helpful, explanatory support with 100% resolutions.
Every theme we provide includes a top class, thorough and easy to use documentation.

Accessibility Ready Theme

Accessibility in web design means creating web pages that everyone can use, regardless of hardware, software, or any sensory or physical impairment.

[wm_button url="https://codex.wordpress.org/Accessibility" color="simple" size="l"]More on accessibility »[/wm_button]

Within a year
we tripled our customer base!

Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test. Override the digital divide with additional clickthroughs.

Nanotechnology immersion along the information highway will close the loop on focusing solely on the bottom line a new evolved.

Easy way to build creative accessible websites

02.

03.

Unique, truly responsive, fast and SEO optimized

04.

We help brands stand out, succeed and grow

Freemium founders early adopters advisor alpha release niche market infographic startup channels focus. Iteration focus marketing conversion.

Frequently Asked Questions

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Where can I get the theme?

You can read more information and download the theme from the marketplace. For other cool WordPress themes please visit www.webmandesign.eu.

Can you ship internationally?

Buyer iteration value proposition product management partnership. Alpha beta rockstar traction facebook buyer lean startup hackathon user experience.

Do I need to register to place an order?

Investor prototype infographic client channels. Graphical user interface pivot long tail first mover advantage series.

[wm_divider appearance="whitespace" /]

No subscriptions

You pay once and it's yours.

GPL licensed

The theme is licensed under GPL.

Updates included

All future theme updates are free.

[wm_call_to_action caption="We'd like to work with you!" button_text="Get the theme" button_url="#purchaselink" button_size="xl"]

Productize horsehead offer, yet we're ahead of the curve on that one streamline staff engagement move the needle.

[/wm_call_to_action]

item.content:encoded: A short status update, similar to a Twitter status update. The whole post content is displayed without excerpt and post title. If no featured image set, the post author avatar is used.

item.title: Style guide
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Below is just about every HTML element you might want to use in your blog posts. Check the source code to see the many embedded elements within paragraphs.

Heading Two

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, test link adipiscing elit. This is strong. Nullam dignissim convallis est. Quisque aliquam. This is emphasized.

Heading Three

Donec faucibus. Nunc iaculis suscipit dui. 53 = 125. Water is H2O. Nam sit amet sem. Aliquam libero nisi, imperdiet at, tincidunt nec, gravida vehicula, nisl. The New York Times (That’s a citation).

Heading Four

Underline. Maecenas ornare tortor. Donec sed tellus eget sapien fringilla nonummy. Mauris a ante. Suspendisse quam sem, consequat at, commodo vitae, feugiat in, nunc. Morbi imperdiet augue quis tellus.
Heading Five
HTML and CSS are our tools. Mauris a ante. Suspendisse quam sem, consequat at, commodo vitae, feugiat in, nunc. Morbi imperdiet augue quis tellus.
Heading Six
Praesent mattis, massa quis luctus fermentum, turpis mi volutpat justo, eu volutpat enim diam eget metus. To copy a file type COPY filename. Dinner’s at 5:00.Let’s make that 7. This text has been struck.

Quotes

Blockquote

The blockquote is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source. It can be as long or as short as you’d like.
It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it. Oscar Wilde

Pull Quote Styles

To use the pull quote, you simply need to add a class of alignright or alignleft to your content. This can be done in Visual editor with additional style buttons that theme provides. See an example below: 
<blockquote class="alignright">Pull this text right.</blockquote>
This pull quote is just hanging out on the right side of the post. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur.
A pull quote (also known as a lift-out quote) is a quotation or excerpt from an article that is typically placed in a larger or distinctive typeface on the same page, serving to entice readers into an article or to highlight a key topic. The term is principally used in journalism and publishing. Placement of a pull quote on a page may be defined in a publication’s or website’s style guide. Such a typographic device may or may not be aligned with a column on the page. Some designers, for example, choose not to align the quote. In that case, the quotation cuts into two or more columns, as in the example shown.
And this pull quote is pulling text to the left, like a sir. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur.
Pull quotes need not be a verbatim copy of the text being quoted; depending on a publication’s house style pull quotes may be abbreviated for space and/or paraphrased for clarity, with or without indication. There are no hard-and-fast rules for the exact formatting of pull quotes.

List Items

Unordered Lists (Nested)

  • List item one
    • List item one
      • List item one
      • List item two
      • List item three
      • List item four
    • List item two
    • List item three
    • List item four
  • List item two
  • List item three
  • List item four

Ordered List (Nested)

  1. List item one
    1. List item one
      1. List item one
      2. List item two
      3. List item three
      4. List item four
    2. List item two
    3. List item three
    4. List item four
  2. List item two
  3. List item three
  4. List item four

Definition Lists

Definition List Title
Definition list division.
Startup
A startup company or startup is a company or temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.
#dowork
Coined by Rob Dyrdek and his personal body guard Christopher "Big Black" Boykins, "Do Work" works as a self motivator, to motivating your friends.
Do It Live
I'll let Bill O'Reilly will explain this one.

Code Formatting, Tables, Highlighted Text and Address

Preformatted Text and Inline Code

Code can be presented inline, like <?php bloginfo('stylesheet_url'); ?>, or within a <pre> block. 
pre {
	padding: 4%;
	margin-bottom: 1.62em;
	background: #eaecee;
	overflow: auto;
	tab-size: 2;
}

Table Styles

Table Header 1 Table Header 2 Table Header 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3
Division 1 Division 2 Division 3

Highlight Text Style

To use the highlight, you simply need to wrap the text in mark HTML tag. This can be done in the Text editor view. See an example below: 
<mark>This will be highlighted.</mark>

Address Tag

1 Infinite Loop Cupertino, CA 95014 United States

Images and Gallery

Image Alignment

[caption id="" align="aligncenter" width="379"] Captioned image[/caption]

Right Aligned Image

Images may be two-dimensional, such as a photograph, screen display, and as well as a three-dimensional, such as a statue or hologram. They may be captured by optical devices – such as cameras, mirrors, lenses, telescopes, microscopes, etc. and natural objects and phenomena, such as the human eye or water surfaces.

Left Aligned Image

The word image is also used in the broader sense of any two-dimensional figure such as a map, a graph, a pie chart, or an abstract painting. In this wider sense, images can also be rendered manually, such as by drawing, painting, carving, rendered automatically by printing or computer graphics technology, or developed by a combination of methods.

Image Gallery

This is a traditional WordPress thumbnail gallery available in all WordPress sites. To add this gallery, simply click Add Media in your post editor and click Create Gallery. In the Gallery Settings area, choose Thumbnail Grid as the type of gallery. [gallery columns="2" link="file" ids="625,483,350,468"] The awesome mosaic thumbnail gallery is provided by the Jetpack plugin. To add this gallery you will need Jetpack installed. Once installed, simply click Add Media in your post editor and click Create Gallery. In the Gallery Settings area, choose Tiled Mosaic as the type of gallery. [gallery type="rectangular" link="file" ids="625,483,350,468"]

"Formats" Dropdown Button Styles

Dropcap text. Apply this format on the paragraph itself. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat voltu.

Heading style 1

Uppercase text. Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse.

Heading style 2 on paragraph text

Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, highlighted text here, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper, small text here, suscipit lobortis nisl ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat, superscript, subscript.

Heading style 3 on paragraph text

Heading style texts can be used to force heading 1-3 display style on a different element, such as paragraph or any of HTML heading tags. Thus allows keeping the semantic markup, but styling it a bit differently.

Display 1 heading

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat.

Display 1 paragraph

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat.

Display 2 heading

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat.

Display 3 heading

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat.

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat.

Display 4 heading

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat.

Display 4 paragraph

Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat.

Heading with altered font weight

Nam liber tempor cum soluta nobis eleifend option congue nihil imperdiet doming id quod mazim placerat facer possim assum.

Display 2 text with altered font weight

Easy creating pullquotes and inserting quote <cite> tags. by Author
Typi non habent claritatem insitam; est usus legentis in iis qui facit eorum claritatem. Claritas est etiam processus dynamicus, qui sequitur mutationem consuetudium lectorum. Mirum est notare quam littera gothica, quam nunc putamus parum claram, anteposuerit litterarum formas humanitatis per seacula quarta decima et quinta decima. Eodem modo typi, qui nunc nobis videntur parum clari, fiant sollemnes in futurum. Claritas est etiam processus dynamicus, qui sequitur mutationem consuetudium lectorum.
item.excerpt:encoded: The style guide provides you with a blueprint of the theme’s default post and page HTML styles. This post also displays automatically generated table of contents and show you how Formats button styles the text.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Just amazing! Beautiful, functional, precise, posh. I look like macho with them. Even my girlfriend wears them when I sleep.
Pretty good. Not the prettiest wristwatch, especially for the price. The price is really ridiculous! Should be 60€ less at least. Please consider this.

item.title: No sidebar
item.dc:creator: demouser
item.excerpt:encoded: Replacing the sidebar with an empty widget area will basically remove the sidebar from the specific page. However, to make the widget area empty, you first need to add a widget to it and then simply remove it. Only then the WordPress registers a widget area as an empty one.

item.title: No footer secondary widgets
item.dc:creator: demouser
item.excerpt:encoded: Replacing the footer secondary widgets with an empty area will basically remove it from the specific page. However, to make the widget area empty, you first need to add a widget to it and then simply remove it. Only then the WordPress registers a widget area as an empty one.

item.title: Professional support
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded: WebMan Design is well known for providing timely, helpful, professional, friendly free support and explanatory documentation.

item.title: Unique features
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded: Differentiate yourself from others with a beautiful design, readable content and online shop optimized for maximum conversion.

item.title: Responsive design
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded: A modern website needs a mobile ready approach. This theme makes sure your content looks great on any device and any screen.

item.title: Endless possibilities
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded: Flexibility is the focus of all WebMan Design WordPress themes. You can really achieve what you aim for, anything is possible!

item.title: Page builder
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded: The theme is compatible with any decently coded page builder plugin and was successfully tested with 6 of the most popular ones.

item.title: Speed and SEO
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded: Optimized, semantic code of the theme makes your website fast and ready to top the search engines. It supports microformats too!

item.excerpt:encoded:
Create beautiful layouts without any page builder! Set post excerpt displayed in the intro section of a single post page, enable intro widgets (also controllable via WooSidebars plugin), and change the intro background image.
You can do anything!

item.title: Simple Layout
item.dc:creator: demoauthor
item.content:encoded:
Simple
Project Layout

[wm_divider appearance="line" /]

Created using a page builder

Incubator channels advisor traction niche market. Return on investment ownership growth hacking infographic hackathon strategy burn rate business-to-consumer scrum project influencer venture metrics focus.

City trip park maps tourist attractions sailing Holland Tripit discover hotel. Yacht deal camper creditcard taxi sleep. Bus hotspots dollar booking Instagram insurance creditcard Russia people caravan frequent flyer Moscow city trip guest.

  • Client: WebMan Design
  • Website: www.webmandesign.eu
  • Budget: 3000 € – 5000 €
  • Release date: December 2016
